subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Malone scored twice and set up a third goal Sunday in a 6-0 rout of the visiting Philadelphia Flyers that clinched the Eastern Conference title for the Penguins.
snippet: Ryan Malone scored twice and set up a third goal Sunday in a 6-0 rout of the visiting Philadelphia Flyers that clinched the Eastern Conference title for the Penguins.
